myBlog.title: How to learn flutter
myBlog.content: Flutter is an open-source UI software development toolkit by Google, used to build natively compiled applications for mobile (iOS, Android), web, and desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux) from a single codebase. It uses the Dart programming language and is known for its fast development, expressive UI, and strong performance.
myBlog.author: Vinayak Jaimini
